simulation-configuration.name: Courtroom Scenario
simulation-configuration.description: Because the Coroner already asked the witness the secret of Mary is not weakened whatever answer is given by Alice. Because the Coroner asks two times what was said in the argument this scenario shows that Alice does not self repeats. The communication is the following: - Coroner queries Alice for said(X) - Alice answers said(husbandWifeScandal) - Coroner queries Alice for said(X) - Alice answers said(youLied)
